channel.title: Welcome to my website on Welcome to my homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to my website on Welcome to my homepage

item.title: Research Projects
item.description: Here are the various Computer vision projects I worked on: Protein Particle extraction from cryo-EM micrographs using Sematic Segmentation. Odonata Detetion Using YOLO algorithm Tree canopy delination using U-net Drosophila melogaster activity recognition using CNN Mathematical symbol recognition Image Enhancement using Pix2Pix GAN Identification of freshwater fishes from underwater camera feeds.

item.title: Publications and Presentations
item.description: Blesson George, Anshul Assaiya, Robin Jacob Roy, Ajit Kembhavi, Radha Chauhan, Geetha Paul, Janesh Kumar, Ninan Sajeeth Philip. “CASSPER is a semantic segmentation‐based particle picking algorithm for single‐particle cryo‐electron microscopy”. Communications Biology ‐ Nature. February 2021. Conference Presentations: “Image Enhancement using Deep Learning GAN” at the National Seminar, NSAMAP‐2023, organized by St. Thomas College Kozhencherry in January 2023. “Automated Feature Extraction and Classification of Odonates” at the National Seminar, SIAP‐2019, organized by Govt.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Robin Jacob Roy. I’m working as a Computer Vision researcher at airis4D, Thelliyoor and has a profound knowledge on various Computer Vision techniques in Python. Checkout my résumé Rach me out at: Github LinkedIn Twitter
